author: woolfel
msg: updating the change log with the enhancements I made this week

author: woolfel
msg: I've enhanced the sampler with 2 new options. Now by default, the sampler will not append the junit error and exception to the message.
To see the message, users have to explicitly check it in the sampler. This was done so that those using jmeter in CSV format will see the results in one line.

author: yoavs
msg: Bugzilla 37407 (http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=37407) and other minor additions to JspReader.  Kept Vector implementation class for sourceFiles as the code may rely on its thread-safety features, but improved to List interface style.
